pr_title: CLDR-13987 improve @CLDRTool annotation, default CLDR_DIR in tools

timeline.message:
CLDR-13987 improve @CLDRTool annotation, default CLDR_DIR in tools

- use a default CLDR_DIR if the jar is launched from a CLDR dir
- add docs for SearchXML
- correct cldr.jar to cldr-code.jar

timeline.bodyText: quibble: better to make a subroutine; main is too long already
timeline.author: btangmu
